name: create_reminder
description: Creates scheduled reminders that notify via SMS, email, Slack, or calendar events. Supports one-time and recurring reminders with flexible scheduling.

scheduled_time.description: When to trigger the reminder (ISO 8601 datetime format, e.g., '2026-02-03T08:00:00Z')

description.description: Optional detailed description of the reminder

reminder_type.description: The primary notification channel for the reminder

repeat_pattern.description: Optional recurrence pattern. If not provided, creates a one-time reminder
